Description: LTD VIPER-400 Electric Guitar A great LTD Viper 400 electric guitar!!! It has a beautiful trans Red finish, set neck construction, a 24 fret fully bound rosewood fretboard with gorgeous ESP Flag inlays, black hardware, Grover tuners, and it has 2 EMG active humbucker pickups that sound great! It is 24.75 scale, the neck width at the nut is a little more than 1 5/8", and it weighs 8.2 pounds.. The condition is good (a 7.4 out of 10) with heavy signs of use and shows average fret wear, the guitar has many playing scratches all around but no problems except for several dings along the sides(See pics). Serial#W0504633, made in Korea in 2005, includes the Peavey gig bag case. New list price was $849. USA Shipping, handling, and insurance charge will be $50 in USPS's deliverable USA 48 states. International shipment and handling is $150 for most other countries via USPS's deliverable Priority Mail International delivery plus you may have to pay import taxes/duties to import and it may take 45 days or longer to receive(Only the smaller less populated countries will take that long, not the mainstream well populated countries). The shipping and handling charge will be $100 for Canada delivery. I reserve all rights. 　 I always declare and insure for the full purchase price, no exceptions. 　 Check out my other auctions as I usually have guitars and parts for sale. I buy and sell quality musical instruments and have over 6000 positive Ebay feedbacks so bid with confidence that you will receive quality merchandise as described, shipped promptly and securely. I also have been playing lead guitar since 1979. No trades. Please...
